_header: Wherefore beware both one and other
_description: Moralising conclusion added in a later hand to the Life of St. Cuthbert (4578) — 13 lines in couplets (first unrhymed)

BLEge3309.First Lines:
Wherfore be war bothe on and othyrWhen ȝe haue redde thys buke
                    owrThat here ys partyd þus in fowre…
BLEge3309.Last Lines:
…So shall ȝe be and do þer eftyrHevynly cityzens to
                    reyn for euer
BLEge3309.Editions:
Fowler,  Joseph Thomas,
                        ed.  
             The Life of St Cuthbert in English Verse, c. A.D 1450 from the original
                MS. in the Library at Castle Howard.
Surtees Society
         87 (1891): 245.
